body:
The latest release of CMake updates libuv, which fixes ObjC code usage on macOS. Passing ObjC code to non apple-clang compilers crashed the build before #16249.

But there are further issues to address before this conflict can be removed.

Refs.:
- https://gitlab.kitware.com/cmake/cmake/-/issues/20620 (fixed)
- https://gitlab.kitware.com/cmake/cmake/-/merge_requests/4687 (merged)
- https://gitlab.kitware.com/cmake/cmake/-/issues/21135 (open)
title: CMake: Update GCC on macOS Conflict message
